description.title: Summary
description.content: The web app is a complete Pokédex that gives users the ability to search, filter, and explore detailed Pokémon information. Allows you to create new Pokémon and store them in a database. With sorting options and details like type, abilities, stats, and moves, it provides a comprehensive experience for Pokémon fans.

data.title: Form to create pokemons
data.content: Design and development of an intuitive form so that users can create new pokemons

data.title: Building Components and Views
data.content: Design and development of views and components necessary for users to see the pokemons, plus their filtering and paging

data.title: Creation of database models
data.content: Relational database implementation to be able to save created pokemons and be able to add them to favorites

data.title: Creation of server and routes
data.content: Construction of the server plus its routes through which the client can communicate to consume both the pokemon-api to see the pokemons and the database to create and edit pokemons

description.title: Summary
description.content: ToolMatch is a web application developed as a final group project during the Henry Full Stack Developer bootcamp. The application follows Scrum methodology and GitHub Flow. It is designed to facilitate the buying, selling, and renting of used tools within Latin American neighborhoods.

data.title: Design and development of view for the product
data.content: Creation of view for the detail of the product publication (title, user, location and price).

data.title: Design and development of product publication form
data.content: With the use of the geolocation api of the browser, the products are published with their coordinates to later be able to filter by distance.

data.title: Design and development of the header
data.content: Develop the main navigation bar, which allowed smooth navigation between the different sections of the site.

data.title: Design and development of the purchase or lease completion form
data.content: Creation of the form that allows the user to finalize their purchase or lease allowing them to choose between the option of paying on delivery or with market payment.

data.title: Deploy web application in vercel
data.content: Implementation of the launch of the web application in vercel.

data.title: Editing modals
data.content: I implemented small modals that allow users to edit their photo, personal information, technology stack and profile description.

data.title: View of 'About us'
data.content: I developed the page that shows the information of the creators of the web application. This section includes a brief explanation about the developer group and its goals, allowing users to learn more about who is behind the project.

data.title: Password matching and encryption functionality with JWT
data.content: I used JSON Web Tokens (JWT) to encrypt and decrypt the passwords in the login and registration forms. JWT provided an additional layer of security and enabled strong authentication between the client and the server.

description.title: Summary
description.content: Wave is a dating app that allows users to find people with similar interests and chat with them. It is designed to facilitate communication among users and enable them to connect with like-minded individuals.

data.content: Design the user interface for the chat feature and implement the functionality for sending and receiving messages.

data.content: Establish global styles for the website and define necessary variables for a consistent design.
